players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob was found dead last night, which means one of us is the mafia. We need to watch each other's behavior carefully and try to figure out who it is before more of us get killed."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafia. I investigated her last night and confirmed it."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafia, and we need to vote her out now before she kills again."
You: "Diana has not said anything to defend herself despite strong accusations from Charlie. If Charlie is telling the truth, we should vote Diana out to protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
